foreignData.name: Goblingrenadiere
foreignData.text: Opfere die Goblingrenadiere: Zerstöre eine Kreatur und ein Land Deiner Wahl. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn die Goblingrenadiere angreifen und nicht geblockt werden.

name: Goblin Grenadiers
originalText: Sacrifice Goblin Grenadiers: Destroy target creature and target land. Use this ability only if Goblin Grenadiers is attacking and unblocked.

rulings.text: Both a creature and a land must be targeted when the ability triggers. If there aren’t enough legal targets, the ability doesn’t go on the stack and Goblin Grenadiers can’t be sacrificed this way.
A permanent that’s both a land and a creature may be chosen as both of this ability’s targets.

An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

text: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.
